message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a premium price point of $1,150,000.  I believe, based on your needs, this is a fair offer that allows me to recoup some of its inherent value.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I'm only able to offer $1,100,000 for it. This is the maximum amount I'm willing to spend.

Bob, I appreciate you countering and understand your position.  However, $1,100,000 significantly undervalues what this product brings to the table. To meet you halfway, I can go down to $1,135,000. This reflects the true value and the benefits you'll gain.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect your valuation, I am unable to increase my offer. I would like to stick at $1,100,000 for the product.
